title: Russia Pummels Ukrainian Civilian Targets Ahead of Talks - The Wall Street Journal
content:
1. Russia Pummels Ukrainian Civilian Targets Ahead of Talks  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Russian forces launch attacks in Kyiv and Mariupol as civilians try to evacuate  CBS News
  3. Proud Band of Ukrainian Troops Holds Russian Assault at Bay — for Now  The New York Times
  4. 'Rivers of blood and tears': Ukraine says Russia steps up shelling of residential areas  KSL.com
  5. Russia ramps up attacks on Ukrainian cities as war enters 12th day  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Continuing their encirclement operations on Ukrainian cities, Russian forces prevented civilians from escaping via humanitarian corridors and shelled urban centers in the country’s north and south.
